original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Joseph: Lord, please bless their land. Send rain from the sky above, and springs of water from under the ground. I pray this for the tribe of Joseph: Lord, please bless their land. Send rain from the sky above, and springs of water from under the ground. I pray this for the tribe of Joseph: Lord, please bless their land. Send rain from the sky above, and springs of water from under the ground. I pray this for the tribe of Joseph: Lord, please bless their land. Send rain from the sky above, and springs of water from under the ground. I pray this for the tribe of Joseph: Lord, please bless their land. Send rain from the sky above, and springs of water from under the ground. I pray this for the tribe of Joseph:
korean_text: 요셉에 대하여는 일렀으되 원하건대 그 땅이 여호와께 복을 받아 하늘의 보물인 이슬과 땅 아래에 저장한 물과

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Joseph:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 요셉 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: Send rain from the sky above,
and springs of water from under the ground.
